name: LD50
description:
A super asteroid was on course to hit the Earth, a last ditch effort to divert it failed and now the debris from the explosion precedes the super asteroid. You must clear up the debris and slow down the super asteroid to give the citizens of Earth a chance to get to shelters. You cannot stop the impact, only delay the inevitable. Good Luck.!

A Ludum Dare Compo 50 entry
